statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (5,-12) and (10,2).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

solution.p: \displaystyle\frac{{{2}-{\left(-{12}\right)}}}{{{10}-{\left({5}\right)}}}=\frac{{14}}{{5}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{14}}{{5}} (if it's not already reduced)
